body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. open duel decks screen.
2. open deck editor
3. load a new deck with a description
4. select "use this deck" What is the expected output? What do you see instead? deck description should be updated but it is not.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Deck description in duel setup not updated when loading new deck from deck editor
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on December 11, 2013 16:35:56_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. open duel decks screen.
2. open deck editor
3. load a new deck with a description
4. select "use this deck" What is the expected output? What do you see instead? deck description should be updated but it is not.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=450_
